title: Project Icons
body: Will the Project Icons be leaving the store, or are they staying?

replies.body: The PROJECT: icons are not legacy, and will be stickin' around for a while.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=pm0MEohN,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-09-09T16:52:55.064+0000)
>
> The PROJECT: icons are not legacy, and will be stickin' around for a while.

So they will be leaving the store eventually, and then they won't come back?
If they are leaving the store, then i might as well get them, but if they are sticking in the store like the Arcade Baron Icon, then i won't be purchasing them.
We don't intend to remove them in the foreseeable future.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=pm0MEohN,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-09-09T18:10:57.933+0000)
>
> We don't intend to remove them in the foreseeable future.

I see, thanks for the info, maybe an announcement would be nice before you guys remove em? If ever? :)
You're welcome! For sure, we make announcements when skins and other content are leaving the store. :]
